description:
**NOTE:** This extension is no longer supported.  See here for additional [information](https://github.com/chocolatey/package-validator/wiki/ScriptsDoNotDownloadFromFossHub)

Provides a helper function to help with extracting the actual download URL for an application whose binaries are housed on FossHub.

These functions may be used in Chocolatey install/uninstall scripts by declaring this package a dependency in your package's nuspec.

<`dependencies`>
  <`dependency id="chocolatey-fosshub.extension" /`>
<`/dependencies`>

### Functions

`Get-UrlFromFosshub` --  Get the resolved URL from a FossHub download link.

Example:
`Get-UrlFromFosshub http://www.fosshub.com/genLink/Data-Crow/FILE.zip`
summary: Helper Function for extracting download URL from FossHub
author: gep13, dtgm, chocolatey
